tooltip:
Advanced Fortune
 
Increases trigger changes of all towers by [color=GOLD]10%[/color]

Element Mastery
 
Increases starting knowledge tomes by [color=GOLD]40[/color].

Swiftness Mastery
 
Increases attack speed of all towers by [color=GOLD]7%[/color].

Combat Mastery
 
Increases base attack damage of all towers by [color=GOLD]8%[/color].

Mastery of Pain
 
Increases attack and spell critical strike chance of all towers by [color=GOLD]4%[/color].

Advanced Sorcery
 
Increases spell damage of all towers by [color=GOLD]10%[/color].

Mastery of Magic
 
Increases mana pool and regeneration of all towers by [color=GOLD]20%[/color].

Mastery of Logistics
 
Increases food limit by [color=GOLD]16[/color].

Loot Mastery
 
Increases item chance of all towers by [color=GOLD]12%[/color].

Advanced Wisdom
 
Increases experience gain of all towers by [color=GOLD]20%[/color].

Pillage Mastery
 
Increases bounty collected by [color=GOLD]16%[/color].

Fortified Will
 
Decreases duration of debuffs on all towers by [color=GOLD]7.5%[/color].

Inner Focus
 
Increases duration of buffs on all towers by [color=GOLD]6%[/color].

Bond of Unity
 
Increases starting lives by [color=GOLD]20%[/color].

Foundation of Knowledge
 
All tower start with [color=GOLD]30[/color] experience.

Deadly Strikes
 
Increases attack and spell critical damage of all towers by [color=GOLD]17.5%[/color].

Fortune's Favor
 
Increases item quality of all towers by [color=GOLD]6.5%[/color].

Challenge Conqueror
 
Increases damage dealt to Challenge enemies by [color=GOLD]8%[/color].

Advanced Synergy
 
Increases effectiveness of other Wisdom Upgrades by [color=GOLD]6%[/color] (unaffected by Wisdom Upgrade effectiveness).

The Art of Ascension
 
Increases effectiveness of other Wisdom Upgrades by [color=GOLD]0.1%[/color] for every player level unspent on upgrades (unaffected by Wisdom Upgrade effectiveness).
